Catalysis Measurement Metadata
description
Name of the Measurement
Name of the analytical method or reaction name as identified by the user
Details of the experiment method used for the measurement
Start Tiem of Measurement
End Time of Measurement
Unique ID of the substance within the group
Details on the chemical Substance
General Name of the substance as identified in the group (not necessarily the standard name)
Physical state of the substance (solid, liquid, gas, mixture, solution, etc.)
Unique ID of the substance within the group
Identifier of the method of prepration of the substance if synthesized (precipitation, incipient wetness impregnation etc.)
Date of the synthesis of the material
Name of the person who synthesized the material
Documentation (or link to respective file) of the applied synthesis procedure
List of precursors (and/or materials and devices) that were used in the synthesis of the material
Name of the person who purcahsed
When was this substance purchased
Batch or LOT number of the material
CAS Number
PubChem ID
Details on the Software Environment
Software Name
Software Version
Details of the used Devices
Name of the device as identified by the user
Type of the device used (fixed-bed reactor, TEM setup etc.)
Name of the company that manufactured the device
Issued serial number by the manufacturer
Details for the detector(s) used in connection with operation of respective device
Detection Unit
Unique local ID of the device
